songs.hillelarnold.com
finished | incomplete | fragments

These are lyrics and chords to my songs.

Some of them have been recorded and copyrighted. The copyright claimed at the time of publication applies to those.

The remainder are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License, which means you may remix, tweak, or otherwise build upon them. However, there are three conditions:

  1. the work you produce must be non-commercial
  2. you must credit me, and
  3. whatever you create must be licensed under these identical terms.

Got it? Good.
